description: logon client to zone, must use post type of request

RFC 8908: Captive Portal API status object  The URI for this endpoint can be provisioned to the client as defined by RFC 7710.  Request and response must set media type as "application/captive+json".  Response contains the following fields: - captive: boolean: client is currently in a state of captivity. - user-portal-url: string: URL to login web portal (must be HTTPS). - seconds-remaining: number: seconds until session expires, only relevant if hardtimeout set.  Fields not implemented here but possible in the future: - venue-info-url: string: Information page (must be HTTPS) - can-extend-session: boolean: hint that client system can access user-portal-url to extend session. - bytes-remaining: number: no. of bytes after which session expires.  Response must set Cache-Control to 'private' or 'no-store'
